fields.name: MinimumForms
fields.fieldText:
You still need forms to complete before you can submit

The Minimum forms are:

  • Parent Guardian
  • Emergency Contact
  • Screening Questions
  • Photo Release
  • Emergency Treatment
  • Client Waiver
  • Medical History
  • Payment Info
  • Desired Schedule
